1.text: Sit 3 or more players in a circular formation.

2.text: Give each player 3 chips to start.

3.text: Designate the numbers on the dice if you don’t have retail LCR dice.

4.text: Choose a player to start the game.

5.text: Get the first player to roll the 3 game dice.

6.text: Have the first player give or keep their chips based on what they rolled.

7.text: Continue to the next player moving clockwise.

8.text: Roll the same number of dice that you have chips after the first round.

9.text: Stay in the game if you lose all your chips.

10.text: Continue with the game until one player acquires all the chips.

11.text: Try LCR Wild to make the game more competitive.

12.text: Play LCR Last Chip Wins to keep the game going.

13.text: Use the dots-to-win LCR variant to make winning more difficult.

14.text: Choose your own stakes in LCR if you play where gambling is legal.
